forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
A serene morning graces Downtown San Francisco, where the sun announces its presence with a gentle brightness, illuminating the urban landscape with a soft clarity. As the day unfolds, expectations tease a high near sixty degrees, tapering down to a mild fifty-eight in the afternoon. The whispers of a south-southwest breeze, invigorating yet calm, dance between the buildings, hinting at the warm embrace of a Spring day.

Though the skies remain mostly blue, a fleeting vestige of the ever-present marine layer lingers in the distance, softly enveloping the waters around the Golden Gate with a mysterious allure. Tonight, the tranquility remains as clouds gather partially overhead, and the chill of evening beckons, dropping to around forty-six degrees. For those meandering through the streets, a light jacket will suffice, whispering comfort without being burdensome. Perhaps take a stroll along the Embarcadero, letting the gentle lull of the bay calm your thoughts as you indulge in the simplest moments this city has to offer. After all, it’s these mundane pleasures that often weave the richest connections.
